title: Ionic liquid-based extraction of metal ions via polymer inclusion membranes: A Critical Review

Polymer Inclusion Membranes (PIMs) have significantly advanced the field of membrane-based separation technologies introducing an innovative method for the selective transport and extraction of metal ions. The incorporation of ionic...
